refnamediv.refpurpose: Permute two handles in the graphic Hierarchy.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The swap_handles function allows to permute two handles in the graphic hierarchy. The first handle will take the second handle position and vice versa.
The handles must have the same parent type or the same type to avoid incompatibilities.
This routine may be used on children of the same parent to change their indices.
